MemoryInfobox.description: 'Looking for a big reward? The Cerberus brothers|Cerberus wants you. No matter if he's dead or alive, the Markos|Con of Kos must be brought to justice—now.'

General_Description: '''A Business Opportunity''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra came across her old friend from [[Kephallonia]], [[Markos]], who was now known as the "Con of [[Kos]]" and had a [[Bounty hunter|bounty]] placed on him.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra infiltrated the [[Artemisia Fort]], hearing a man crying for help.
*'''Markos:''' ''Help! Somebody? Anybody? Hello?''
Kassandra approached the cage and saw Markos in it.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Markos?''
*'''Markos:''' ''Kassandra?'' Chaire''!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''How...''
*'''Markos:''' ''Kept myself busy, haven't I? No time to explain here. Get me out!''
Kassandra opened the cage and carried Markos on her back.
*'''Markos:''' ''You're as nimble as ever! Now, carry me to my house on the other side of the [[Highlands of Asklepiades|mountain]].''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I have to carry you the whole way?''
*'''Markos:''' ''I-I'm so weak. I'm so frail...''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Fine.''
Kassandra carried Markos out of the fort and brought him to a [[Aion Vineyard|vineyard]] near the mountain.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Markos. [[Markos' Vineyard|Another]] vineyard?''
*'''Markos:''' ''I am nothing if not consistent, my friend!''
She put him down on the ground, allowing him to recover a moment.
*'''Markos:''' ''Ah, much better! No one makes a hasty exit like you.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You're welcome.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra rescued Markos from the Artemisia Fort.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
